forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 2C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 36F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
